<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blessed Denial](/Feats.aspx?ID=6280) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 190 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=242)

**Prerequisites**
[Blessed One Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6277)

**Trigger**
An ally within 30 feet would become [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68), [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91), or [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94).

</column>

---

You exude peace and protection, lessening a harmful condition as it falls upon an ally. Reduce the value of the condition your ally would take by 1 (to a minimum of 0). If the ally has more than one eligible condition at the same time, choose one to reduce.
name: Blessed Denial
